column4: I can't figure out how to install the sun jdk1.6. I apt-get it, but it isn't saved where it should be (/lib/jvm or /usr/lib/jvm)
you will need to manually install java now
what's the packet in the apt repo then?
its not hard to install manually
bin files are executables, what did you download?
The sun jdk 6u30 installer, but it kept trying to open in notepad, therefore my confusion
mark it as executable and run it in terminal, I suggest you move it to /opt first
or even better, copy it to /usr/lib/jvm
I made a script for it: http://paste.ubuntu.com/785704/
Thanks, I think I've already done it. Let me just check if it worked real quick
when the black screen shows, press ESC and you can watch the boot
